title: Basic Rules
items: Be respectful to everyone - no harassment, bullying, or hate speech
Keep chat and builds family-friendly (no NSFW content)
Don't pretend to be staff members or other players
No excessive spam or caps lock in chat
Resolve conflicts maturely or ask staff for help

title: Gameplay Rules
items: No hacks, cheats, or exploits (x-ray, fly, speed hacks, etc.)
Report bugs with '/ticket' - don't abuse them
One main account per person (ask staff before using alts)
No griefing or stealing from other players
PvP is allowed in designated areas only

title: Building & Economy
items: Build at least 100 blocks away from others unless given permission
No inappropriate builds, signs, or symbols
Don't duplicate items or abuse the economy
Shops must have fair prices (no scamming)
Clean up temporary builds and don't leave floating trees

title: Chat & Communication
items: English only in global chat (other languages in /msg or party chat)
No advertising other servers or Discord links
Don't ask for staff ranks, items, or special treatment
Use appropriate channels in Discord
No drama or arguments in public chat
